name: Game of Thrones: Episode Six - The Ice Dragon
name_original: Game of Thrones: Episode Six - The Ice Dragon
description:
Game of Thrones: Episode Six - The Ice Dragon is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 17-11-2015. Telltale Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Game of Thrones: Episode Six - The Ice Dragon on PC and PlayStation 3.
